name: Bardock
description: He is a low-class Saiyan from Planet Vegeta in Universe 7. He belongs to the Saiyan Army, which is under the leadership of King Vegeta, and is the leader of his squad during the annexation of the planet by the colonial forces of the Freeza Empire.

originPlanet.name: Vegeta
originPlanet.description: Planet Vegeta, known as Planet Plant before the end of the Saiyan-Tsufruian War in the year 730, is a fictional rocky planet from the manga and anime series Dragon Ball and located in the Milky Way of the Northern Galaxies of Universe 7.
